Add GitHub Action to test reproducibility

Source: R/use_github_action.R
use_github_action.Rd

Creates a GitHub Actions workflow that runs isReproducible() on all R Markdown files in the repository. The workflow installs pandoc so that the documents can be rendered. Depending on the result, a badge file reproducibleRchunks-badge.svg is generated indicating successful, failing or unknown reproduction status.

Usage

use_github_action(
  files = NULL,
  path = ".github/workflows/reproducibleR.yml",
  packages = NULL
)

Arguments

files

Character. File(s) that should be tested for reproducibility. If NULL, all Rmd files in the directory.

path

Path to the workflow file to create. Defaults to .github/workflows/reproducibleR.yml.

packages

Character. If NULL, necessary R packages are inferred automatically.

Value

Invisibly returns the path to the created workflow file.

On this page
